story.title: How to Play
story.text: Start a run and challenge each of the Boss Pieces to a game of chess. But these are not ordinary games.

story.title: The Game
story.text: Win a game by meeting the required score within 10 turns. Your Score is your Piece x Advantage

story.title: Offense is the best defense
story.text: Capture your opponents pieces to improve your Advantage, and use Cards to enhance your Pieces.

story.title: Select Difficulty
story.text: Medium is recommended for most players. Choose Easy if you're new to chess, or Expert for a serious challenge.
